sub_title: International Higher Education Specialist | MBA | Executive Education | Student Recruitment | Tie-ups | Consulting | Training | Education Missions | Conferences | Workshops | Career Coaching
summary:
Good day, I am a Senior International Higher Education & Management Consultant, Executive & Career Coach. Keynote Speaker, Trainer, Lecturer

INTERNATIONAL FACULTY & KEYNOTE SPEAKER: I have developed and/or delivered a number of MBA, Master & Bachelor courses, Management & Faculty development programs in Netherlands, Spain, India, Germany, Ukraine. Most popular MBA courses are: Strategic HRM, , New Business Ventures, Change Management, Organisation & Management, Business Development, Human Resource Development, Media Communication. 

INTERNATIONAL HIGHER EDUCATION CONSULTANT: I help higher education leaders develop and manage international collaborations both with academia as with industry. I help develop new Master/Bachelor courses, secure accreditation, promote and also with student recruitment and admission. I help train faculty and coach students to find internships and placements both domestic and abroad. I also assist with conducting a feasibility to set-up a campus in Bengaluru, India. 
I help explore Indian and European markets through feasibility studies, exploratory (Education)missions, preparing a strategic road map and also through conferences and workshops using a structured networking method I have pioneered to engage with the relevant stakeholders. 

INTERNATIONAL ADMISSIONS & STUDENT RECRUITMENT: I help students and executives as well as faculty select courses, secure admission and with the paperwork to secure funding and visa. I have experience in student recruitment and admissions to Bachelor, Master, PhD and Executive courses in Europe and USA.

INTERNATIONAL EXECUTIVE & CAREER COACH: I help top students and executives to find a new/better job. 

CONFERENCE CHAIR & WORKSHOP FACILITATOR: I am active as Chairman of EuroAsian University & Career Network - my professional network that I have developed over 30+ years to help generate and disseminate actionable insights into developing and managing collaborations, new ventures and human resources. Launched in 2006 at the European Parliament, I have organized and run over 100 workshops, conferences and webinars in Europe and in India. These events have been well received by academia, industry and government.

EUROASIAN EDUCATION & CAREER NEWSLETTER: I have started a newsletter  to inform about my Education and Career related projects, activities and to share insights from finished and ongoing projects.

CONTACT ME TO ARRANGE A CONVERSATION / MEETING: Email. nagpaul.vivek@gmail.com or inbox me, Landline number + 31 346 250530 (CET).

We operate as:

* CAREER ENGINE

* INFORMAL CONSORTIUM 
We develop, promote, deliver, evaluate degree courses, executive courses, training, workshops, conferences and all other knowledge programs worldwide.

* INCUBATOR

* COLLABORATIONS
We help government, academia and industry develop and manage collaborations, partnerships,  joint ventures worldwide.

* TALENT MANAGEMENT 
We help academia, government and industry to source, develop, deploy, manage, utilize, retain and transfer talent.

EUROASIAN UNIVERSITY AND CAREER NETWORK 

This is my professional network I have been building since last 30+ years across India, Europe, North America and elsewhere. We are organized in knowledge and industry groups. 

EDUCATION & CAREER MISSIONS, CONFERENCES & WORKSHOPS IN EUROPE AND INDIA

We launched EuroAsian University and Career Network Conferences and Workshops in 2006 at a high-level EU -India Summit at European Parliament in Brussels to generate and disseminate actionable insights for EU and India stakeholders to develop and manage international collaborations,  new ventures and human resources. We partner with academia, government, industry and intermediaries to produce and deliver workshops and conferences.

Our next India Missions:
17 September till 1 November 2023

Our next Europe Missions
21 June till 17 September 2023
1 November till 21 December 2023
